title: Global symplectic potentials on the Witten covariant phase space for bosonic extendons
abstract: It is proved that the projections of the deformation vector field, normal and tangential to the worldsheet manifold swept out by Dirac-Nambu-Goto bosonic extendons propagating in a curved background, play the role of {\it global} symplectic potentials on the corresponding Witten covariant phase space. It is also proved that the {\it presymplectic} structure obtained from such potentials by direct exterior derivation, has not components tangent to the action of the relevant diffeomorphisms group of the theory.
